docs.title: Jesse Hartman
docs.text: Welcome to my personal corner of the internet! I'm passionate about coffee, podcasting, development, and photography.

docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I'm a developer, coffee enthusiast, and content creator who loves exploring the intersection of technology and creativity. Here you'll find my thoughts, experiences, and tutorials across my various interests.
